title: SAIC's MG Motor India plans to bring in Indian investors including JSW
description: SAIC Motor's MG Motor India to attract investors for market expansion and risk prevention. JSW Ventures, IndoEdge India Fund, dealer trust, and employee stock plan to aid growth in India's auto sector.
